job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.
     * Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
     * Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.
     * Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
     * Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
     * Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
     * Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.
     * Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.
job_details.full_text:
Senior C++ Software Engineer - NXCAM

* Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.
     * Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
     * Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.
     * Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
     * Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
     * Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
     * Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.
     * Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional C++ software engineering tasks, including design, development, testing, and maintenance of existing software. While it mentions research and prototyping, there is no indication of involvement with AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies. The core responsibilities and technologies described align with general software engineering rather than any of the specialized AI roles defined in the coding book.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software,' 'Creating and testing feature components,' and 'Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions,' which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software

job_tasks.justification: Activities like 'research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities' are part of the software development lifecycle, especially in a senior role.
job_tasks.phrase: Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities

job_tasks.justification: Ensuring 'software quality through unit and system-level testing' is a fundamental aspect of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with a Product Owner to 'building and refining user stories and acceptance tests' indicates an understanding of business requirements and translating them into technical tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests

job_tasks.justification: Practices like 'Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review' and 'Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment' highlight collaboration and communication.
job_tasks.phrase: Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review

job_tasks.justification: Maintaining 'continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment' directly relates to communication and collaboration skills.
job_tasks.phrase: Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment

job_tasks.justification: Applying 'best practices in coding, design, and implementation' is a key aspect of professional software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions

job_tasks.justification: Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit demonstrates collaboration and knowledge sharing.
job_tasks.phrase: Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests
Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review
Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment
Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit
